Posts.Content: Apr 26, 2019 08:15AM Volleyballmom2008 wrote: Hi Ladies. I finished chemo in December, had lumpectomy in January, full pcr, just finished last week 6 weeks of radiation. Went to oncologist Monday, she felt around all was good. Last night I felt a lump right under my scar, near corner of it. It is close to skin surface, don't have to press to hard to feel. I am freaking out. Called surgeon out of town, see her on May 9th.
Posts.Title: Firmness/Hardness in Lumpectomy Area 2.5 months post lumpectomy? kec1972 Volleyballmom2008
